quest.name: Warm Smelly Clothes
Warm Smelly Clothes
quest.text: Magic Arpan is waiting for you. Go speak to him.
To speak to an NPC, click on it with your mouse or select it using the N key and then chat using the T key.

quest.name: Warm Smelly Clothes
Warm Smelly Clothes
quest.text: You need to open the chest and take the clothes from it.
To perform this action, click on the chest with your mouse or select it with the N key and then interact with it using the T key.

quest.name: Warm Smelly Clothes
Warm Smelly Clothes
quest.text: To open your inventory, use the F3 key or use your mouse to select it in the above menu in your client.
When your inventory is open, you can equip an item by selecting it and clicking 'Equip'. You can do the same to remove an item by clicking on 'Unequip'.
Items have different effects. Some will heal you, some can be used as weapons or armor and some can be sold for gold.

quest.name: Warm Smelly Clothes
Warm Smelly Clothes
quest.text: You wore the clothes you found in the chest that Magic Arpan showed you.
They are old and a bit smelly but the warm sensation they give makes you feel at home.

quest.name: Contrabandist Aboard
Contrabandist Aboard
quest.text: You found a contrabandist aboard Nard's Ship!
He needs your help. Bring him the many items he is asking for!

quest.name: Contrabandist Aboard
Contrabandist Aboard
quest.text: I helped Alige. He claims to be lawful now, but I don't quite believe it.
Well, it is hard to get Artis goods around here, so perhaps I did the right thing?

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: Peter needs your help to clear La Johanne's hold of some rattos.
Speak to him when you will have time to help him.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: Peter asked you to empty the bottom of the ship for free.
Maybe next time he will have something to offer you...

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: Cleaning the bottom of the ship is a tough work, but Peter is offering you some gold for it.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: You helped Peter cleaning the bottom of the ship for free.
However, it looks like these rattos can come back again. Later, you could ask Peter if he needs your help again.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: You helped Peter cleaning the bottom of the ship. He rewarded you with some gold.
However, it looks like these rattos can come back again. Later, you could ask Peter if he needs your help again.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: This time, Peter seems to have a reward for you. After you cleaned the bottom of the ship, ask him for a reward.

quest.name: Chef's Secret Blade
Chef's Secret Blade
quest.text: You found a sharp knife on a table in one of the rooms of the ship.
It looks like its previous owner used it to prepare delicious dishes for the crew.

quest.name: My Money
My Money
quest.text: Arpan was holding my money.
It is a small amount, but hey, it is better than nothing!.

quest.name: Good Food makes a Good Crew
Good Food makes a Good Crew
quest.text: Chef Gado is preparing food for the crew, but supplies are running thin.
I should help him by getting 11 {@@1}.

quest.name: Good Food makes a Good Crew
Good Food makes a Good Crew
quest.text: Chef Gado went back to cooking, and I'll be back to hunting.

quest.name: Scary Pious
Scary Pious
quest.text: Dan is afraid of Pious. I should help him by killing 12 Pious.
Progress: {@@var2}/12 Pious

quest.name: Scary Pious
Scary Pious
quest.text: The Pious are gone, now I need to say Dan he can sleep in peace at night.

quest.name: Scary Pious
Scary Pious
quest.text: He gave me a nice outfit for my efforts.

quest.name: ★ - Who Am I?
In Seek Of True Identity
quest.text: I better find out who I am.
I mean, it is annoying when all you know is your name.
I bet the ##BShip's captain##b can help.

quest.name: ★ - Who Am I?
In Seek Of True Identity
quest.text: In Tulimshar, after getting out of the ship, I should visit the first building.
It is the townhall. ##BLua##b should be able to help me.

quest.name: ★ - Who Am I?
In Seek Of True Identity
quest.text: I was born at Halinarzo but moved at just 4.
I must get some levels before attempting such dangerous journey.

quest.name: ★ - Who Am I?
In Seek Of True Identity
quest.text: Halinarzo's Librarian asked for three hours.
I should do some bandit extermination on the canyon meanwhile.

quest.name: ★ - Who Am I?
It's Not About Me
quest.text: I listen the real story about missing documents.
It was not really epic, it just says the only failure Andrei Sakar ever did.
Glad to know he is a person like us. (I hope.)
Anyway, I should go to Hurnscald and talk to the Mayor about reaching the World Edge.
##1##BWARNING:##b You need to wait further releases to continue this quest!##0

quest.name: Pride of Money
Pride of Money
quest.text: You are now registered in the Merchant Guild.
This Guild offers storage and bank services.

quest.name: Friendly Players
Friendly Players
quest.text: After paying the taxes, I'm now allowed to create small parties for raids.
With a small group of friends, we can grow a lot!
Later I can ask him to buy the license to create Guilds.
A guild is harder to manage, but there are various benefits in being a Guild Leader.

quest.name: Great Hunter Quest
Great Hunter Quest
quest.text: I promised Aidan to conduct an extermination.

quest.name: Great Hunter Quest
Great Hunter Quest
quest.text: I promised Jacob to conduct an extermination.
The reward should be collected with Aidan.

quest.name: Great Hunter Quest
Great Hunter Quest
quest.text: I promised Lufix to conduct an extermination.
The reward should be collected with Aidan.

quest.name: Great Hunter Quest
Great Hunter Quest
quest.text: I promised Hinnak to conduct an extermination.
The reward should be collected with Aidan.

quest.name: Saxso Chest
Saxso Chest
quest.text: I managed to open the chest on Saxso's house.

quest.name: Hide And Seek
Hide And Seek
quest.text: Find all the children for Ayasha. They're in the Island.

quest.name: Hide And Seek
Hide And Seek
quest.text: You found all childrens, go report to Ayasha.

quest.name: Hide And Seek
Hide And Seek
quest.text: I helped Ayasha to find the children.

quest.name: Tolchi's Request
Tolchi's Request
quest.text: I am helping Tolchi, a weapon craftswoman, to find materials.

quest.name: Tolchi's Request
Tolchi's Request
quest.text: I helped Tolchi with her materials needs.

quest.name: Helping Maya
Helping Maya
quest.text: I am helping out Maya with finding a few items.
I need to find three {@@1} and three {@@2}.

quest.name: Helping Maya
Helping Maya
quest.text: You are helping out Maya with finding a few items.
You need to find three {@@1} and three {@@2}.

quest.name: Cleaning the Storehouse
Cleaning the Storehouse
quest.text: Zegas needs someone to find and defuse the Bug Bomb in the storehouse.
I must check all barrels.

quest.name: Cleaning the Storehouse
Cleaning the Storehouse
quest.text: I defused the bug bomb.
I must report back to Zegas at once.

quest.name: Cleaning the Storehouse
Cleaning the Storehouse
quest.text: I helped Zegas to clear the Storehouse.
More bugs may attack there later, but that's not my problem anymore.

quest.name: Preparing a Party
Preparing a Party
quest.text: Some sailors at beach are planning a party.
They need 5 {@@1} for the party to happen.

quest.name: Preparing a Party
Preparing a Party
quest.text: The sailors have sufficient {@@1} for the party.
They now want me to invite Elmo, the captain's assistant, to the party.

quest.name: Preparing a Party
Preparing a Party
quest.text: Elmo was invited, and with that, the sailors may party.

quest.name: Making a Figurine
Making a Figurine
quest.text: Vincent is making a figurine with {@@1}. He needs 12.

quest.name: Making a Figurine
Making a Figurine
quest.text: Vincent was able to make his figurine thanks to the bug legs I gave him.

quest.name: Trainment
Trainment
quest.text: I have to report to the trainer.

quest.name: Trainment
Trainment
quest.text: I already killed {@@var2}/10 {@@1}.

quest.name: Trainment
Trainment
quest.text: I already killed {@@var2}/5 {@@1}.

quest.name: Trainment
Trainment
quest.text: I already killed {@@var2}/3 {@@1}.

quest.name: Trainment
Trainment
quest.text: I already killed {@@var2}/2 {@@1}.

quest.name: Trainment
Trainment
quest.text: I was successfully trained.

quest.name: Trainment
Trainment
quest.text: The Trainer gave me a bonus task.
I already killed {@@var2}/1 {@@1}.

quest.name: Trainment
Trainment
quest.text: I did the bonus task from the Trainer and he was very impressed.

quest.name: Nurse Candies
Nurse Candies
quest.text: Candor's Nurse loves {@@1}. I gave her one, and now she wants more!
This is an easy way to make some money.

quest.name: Mud Balls
Mud Balls
quest.text: Liana is collecting {@@1} to make balls, so the children can play.
This quest is repeatable.

quest.name: Mud Balls
Mud Balls
quest.text: Liana is collecting {@@1} to make balls, so the children can play.
This quest is repeatable every six hours, so I should again to her sometime.

quest.name: Sailor Cure
Sailor Cure
quest.text: In order to help a sailor to recover from hangover, I collected {@@1}.
Juliet was successful in making a hangover potion. If I ever need one, I already know to whom ask.

quest.name: Fishman
Fishman
quest.text: Eugene, the fishman in Artis docks, bought a new fishing rod.
He hurried so much to try it out, that he forgot to take enough baits.
You need to bring him 10 {@@1}.

quest.name: Fishman
Fishman
quest.text: You helped Eugene.
As his gratitude, he gave you his old fishing rod.
You can use it to catch fish.

quest.name: I Want Cherry Cakes
I Want Cherry Cakes
quest.text: Sarah wanted a cherry cake, so I gave her one.

quest.name: Water For Guards
Water For Guards
quest.text: Dausen asked me to give water to his guards.
There should be a well in the city. I already gave water to {@@var2}/17 guards.

quest.name: Water For Guards
Water For Guards
quest.text: All guards drank water.
I should now report to Dausen that this mission is complete.

quest.name: Water For Guards
Water For Guards
quest.text: I gave water to all Tulimshar guards, and Dausen was very glad.
He told me I can find more ways to help the city guard inside the Guard House.

quest.name: Quenching My Thirst
Quenching My Thirst
quest.text: Swezanne was thirsty, but now she can keep doing her job.
I can repeat this request every 24 hours.

quest.name: Quenching My Thirst
Quenching My Thirst
quest.text: Swezanne is once again thirsty, I should bring her 5 {@@1} to quench it.

quest.name: Lifestone Pendant
Lifestone Pendant
quest.text: Swezanne's Daughter, Silvia, can give you a very useful necklace
For just 500 GP and a Lifestone.

quest.name: Lifestone Pendant
Lifestone Pendant
quest.text: Silvia gave me a Lifestone Pendant, which increases my regeneration.
It'll work even better if I sit to think.

quest.name: Eistein
Eistein
quest.text: I should obtain level 50 and get a reward on Tulimshar's City Hall.

quest.name: Eistein
Eistein
quest.text: I should obtain level 75 and get a reward on Tulimshar's City Hall.

quest.name: Eistein
Eistein
quest.text: I should obtain level 100 and get a reward on Tulimshar's City Hall.

quest.name: Petty Thief
Petty Thief
quest.text: While leaving Tulimshar, a petty thief called Hasan stole me.
I should warn the leader of the guard, Lieutenant Dausen, about that.

quest.name: Petty Thief
Petty Thief
quest.text: Dausen instructed me to seek for his mother, Sorfina.
She should be in Mahoud's house, near the Inn.

quest.name: Petty Thief
Petty Thief
quest.text: I should talk to Sorfina and complete her task.

quest.name: Petty Thief
Petty Thief
quest.text: Having avenged his father, I should talk to Hasan.
Perhaps now he'll stop stealing from me!

quest.name: Petty Thief
Petty Thief
quest.text: Hasan swore to never steal from me again.
He didn't gave my money back, though...

quest.name: Red Scorpion Plague
Red Scorpion Plague
quest.text: Red Scorpions are threating Tulimshar.
I need to bring some stingers, to prove my worth.

quest.name: Sailors Help
Sailors Help
quest.text: Some Sailors in Tulimshar, above Terranite Forge, are in need of some supplies.
I should fetch them 3 Fish Box, 4 Croconut Box and 10 Cotton Clothes.

quest.name: Sailors Help
Sailors Help
quest.text: I gave them what they needed, and now they can resume their journey.

quest.name: Dark Invocator
Dark Invocator
quest.text: After paying Zarkor a token of loyalty, he told me his plans.
He wants to summon the Monster King.
I should talk to Zitoni, on Candor, for some Everburn Powder.

quest.name: Dark Invocator
Dark Invocator
quest.text: Zitoni refused to make the powder.
I must report this to Zarkor.

quest.name: Dark Invocator
Dark Invocator
quest.text: Zarkor gave a precious Dark Desert Mushroom.
I should deliver this rare item to Zitoni on Candor.
...I could just sell it instead, but I think I'll regret doing so later...

quest.name: Dark Invocator
Dark Invocator
quest.text: Zitoni on Candor is now making Everburn Powders.
I need 5 Powders for the ritual.
For each powder, it will cost me 3000 GP, Iron and Sulfur Powder, and a Pile of Ash.

quest.name: Dark Invocator
Dark Invocator
quest.text: I need to lit every torch.
The blue flame get invisible after a while. There's no way to remember!
Ahh... I better find a good way to lit all of them without dying!

quest.name: Dark Invocator
Dark Invocator
quest.text: Zarkor summoned the Monster King and got a nice electrical discharge as a gift.
Well, he didn't gave me anything of worth, but some money and experience.
At least, now I can craft Everburn Powder. I'm sure it'll be useful later.

quest.name: Anwar's Field
Anwar's Field
quest.text: Anwar need help to save his crops!!
If nothing is done Tulimshar will face a famine.
Go talk to Eomie, on Tulimshar Magic School

quest.name: Anwar's Field
Anwar's Field
quest.text: Anwar need help to save his crops!!
If nothing is done Tulimshar will face a famine.
Go talk to Tinris, on Tulimshar Magic School

quest.name: Anwar's Field
Anwar's Field
quest.text: Anwar need help to save his crops!!
If nothing is done Tulimshar will face a famine.
Bring 12 [Cherry Cake] to Tinris, on Tulimshar Magic School.

quest.name: Anwar's Field
Anwar's Field
quest.text: Anwar need help to save his crops!!
If nothing is done Tulimshar will face a famine.
To make a fertilizer with Tinris, I need 3 [Plushroom] and 10 [Maggot Slime].
Then I need to report to anwar, and cross my fingers.

quest.name: Anwar's Field
Anwar's Field
quest.text: Anwar need help to save his crops!!
If nothing is done Tulimshar will face a famine.
Report to Tinris the result of his fertilizer.

quest.name: Anwar's Field
Anwar's Field
quest.text: Anwar need help to save his crops!!
If nothing is done Tulimshar will face a famine.
Deliver to Anwar the bug bomb, to protect the crops.

quest.name: Anwar's Field
Anwar's Field
quest.text: Anwar need help to save his crops!!
If nothing is done Tulimshar will face a famine.
Give to Tinris and Eomie the gift from Anwar.

quest.name: Anwar's Field
Anwar's Field
quest.text: I help Anwar to save his crops, Tulimshar should now be safe from a famine.

quest.name: Neked Shop
Neked Shop
quest.text: My best attempt at a pun with the word naked.
Neko had his Jean Shorts ate by Cave Snakes, who love to eat that.
It is a good item, I should get some Shorts for me!
But Neko needs them, too... How many can I make they drop?

quest.name: Neked Shop
Neked Shop
quest.text: He thanked but refused the shorts.
I probably should use it instead. It's a good defensive item!

quest.name: Tycoon's Hunt
Tycoon's Hunt
quest.text: I have to report to the Tycoon.

quest.name: Tycoon's Hunt
Tycoon's Hunt
quest.text: I already killed {@@var2}/10 {@@1}.

quest.name: Tycoon's Hunt
Tycoon's Hunt
quest.text: I already killed {@@var2}/25 {@@1}.

quest.name: Tycoon's Hunt
Tycoon's Hunt
quest.text: I already killed {@@var2}/50 {@@1}.

quest.name: Tycoon's Hunt
Tycoon's Hunt
quest.text: I already killed {@@var2}/100 {@@1}.

quest.name: Tycoon's Hunt
Tycoon's Hunt
quest.text: I helped the miners.

quest.name: Tycoon's Hunt
Tycoon's Hunt
quest.text: Tycoon had another task on his sleeve! This one is harder, though.
I already killed {@@var2}/200 {@@1}.

quest.name: Tycoon's Hunt
Tycoon's Hunt
quest.text: I did the bonus task from the Tycoon and he was very impressed.

quest.name: Miner Bandage
Miner Bandage
quest.text: Caelum hurt himself while mining, and now he wants to improvise an bandage.
For that, he needs a lifestone and a cotton cloth. He also needs 2 Black Scorpion Stinger.
Besides 5 Scorpion Claw, 10 Bat Teeth, 10 Cactus Drink, 20 Maggot Slime, and 8 Bug Legs.
Ah, these NPCs which require an empire of items...

quest.name: Miner Bandage
Miner Bandage
quest.text: Caelum hurt himself while mining, but now he have an improvised bandage.

quest.name: Foxhound's Famine
Foxhound's Famine
quest.text: A poor man in Halinarzo asks for food.
His family is starving. I should provide him all sort of delicacies.

quest.name: Foxhound's Famine
Foxhound's Famine
quest.text: I feed him, and he is forever grateful.

quest.name: The King Of Blackmarket
The King Of Blackmarket
quest.text: I did a deal with Charles, an apparently famous contrabandist.
He is offering me a mask for my silence, and many items.
All the items are dropped by Sarracenus and Desert Bandits, thankfully!

quest.name: The King Of Blackmarket
The King Of Blackmarket
quest.text: I got my mask, and won't say anyone where Charles is.
But, this is Halinarzo, and Halin is always too far from the forces of law.
I doubt the City Guard doesn't knows where and who he is already, anyway...

quest.name: Saving a Wife's Life
Saving a Wife's Life
quest.text: Joaquim need several items to save his wife's life.
I probably should help.

quest.name: Saving a Wife's Life
Saving a Wife's Life
quest.text: Joaquim gave me an Elixir Of Life.
I should hurry to Halinarzo Hospital and deliver to his wife, Yumi.

quest.name: Saving a Wife's Life
Saving a Wife's Life
quest.text: I managed to save Yumi's life.
I should return to Joaquim and claim my reward.

quest.name: Saving a Wife's Life
Saving a Wife's Life
quest.text: Joaquim's wife will live. Thankfully.
He gave me material to forge something cool.
And he also gave me an Elixir Of Life. Wow.

quest.name: Forest Bow
Forest Bow
quest.text: Alan is willing to do a Forest Bow, for free...
If I get a very resistant wood chunk with Jack.
And I also need a good string, from a Fisherman in Halinarzo.

quest.name: Forest Bow
Forest Bow
quest.text: I got the Forest Bow. I hope to have fun with it!

quest.name: Archery Training
Archery Training
quest.text: Gwendolyn offers archery courses.
It's not exactly cheap, but it isn't expensive either.

quest.name: Archery Training
Archery Training
quest.text: I need a Forest Bow, because that is the only kind of bow her brother makes.
She already took my money, and won't teach me without it...

quest.name: Archery Training
Archery Training
quest.text: I should prove I learnt her lesson by bringing her...
...Snake eggs. Several and from all kinds.

quest.name: Archery Training
Archery Training
quest.text: I passed her class!
I think she have more thing to teach me, but am I strong enough...?

quest.name: Archery Training
Archery Training
quest.text: She gave me the last task.
With the Forest Bow, and Training arrows, I have to hit target.
There are lot of things to consider I usually don't care about.
Can I really get over that challenge?

quest.name: Archery Training
Archery Training
quest.text: I did it! I did it!
I mastered archery!

quest.name: The Yeti King Quest
The Yeti King Quest ({@@var1})
quest.text: I need to find the Yeti King and convince him to fight on our side.
To (re)start this quest, I need to pour 1x {@@1} on Tulimshar Sewer.
This is a loose co-op quest. I cannot start it alone, but I can finish it alone.

quest.name: The Yeti King Quest
The Yeti King Quest ({@@var1})
quest.text: I can now return home, and optionally report Celestia the result.
The Yeti King gave me a reward, maybe I should do that again!

quest.name: Celestia Tea Party
Celestia Tea Party
quest.text: Celestia need many sweets to replace the lack of Cookies.
I could help her, too much sugar is bad to health!

quest.name: Celestia Tea Party
Celestia Tea Party
quest.text: I gave lot of sweeties to Celestia, and now I can drink tea!
Her tea regens some Mana. Maybe in future, she gives me some for travel?

quest.name: Hurnscald Crops
Hurnscald Crops
quest.text: Pinkies are ravaging Hinnak's Fields. He wants 10 antennas.
But he won't reward you without at least a 100 pinkies sacrifice.

quest.name: Hurnscald Crops
Hurnscald Crops
quest.text: Hinnak's farm is safe, but Hurnscald food supply is far from secured.
I should help his friend, Oscar, on the west farm.

quest.name: Hurnscald Crops
Hurnscald Crops
quest.text: Oscar is also having problems with pinkies. He want 10 pink legs for a soup.
But he won't reward you without at least a 100 pinkies sacrifice.

quest.name: Hurnscald Crops
Hurnscald Crops
quest.text: Oscar was very satisfied.
He and Hinnak prepared a reward for you.
Redeem it at the Town Hall.

quest.name: Hurnscald Crops
Hurnscald Crops
quest.text: The crops are safe! Finally!
Hinnak and his wife might still need help, but...
...that's not my problem anymore.

quest.name: Hurnscald Bandits
Hurnscald Bandits
quest.text: Bandits frequently raid Hurnscald Tavern and steal stuff.
They're often caught, but the slimes on the Mines eat the keys!
I should bring her 5 [Treasure Key] to fix that slimey problem.

quest.name: Hurnscald Bandits
Hurnscald Bandits
quest.text: I helped Helena, but she might have another task to me.
I wonder if I am strong enough to help her!

quest.name: Hurnscald Bandits
Hurnscald Bandits
quest.text: Helena was cursed to don't enter the bandit cave!
She wants to give me a great mission, but first,
I need to collect some Bandit Hoods and prove my worth.

quest.name: Hurnscald Bandits
Hurnscald Bandits
quest.text: Helena sent me to kill the Bandit Lord on the Bandit Cave.
But first, I need to find her friend and get the key to his lair.

quest.name: Hurnscald Bandits
Hurnscald Bandits
quest.text: Helena sent me to kill the Bandit Lord on the Bandit Cave.
The Bandit Lord is on a locked cave, but fear not. I got the key.
The only problem now, is finding his lair on these pesky caves!

quest.name: Hurnscald Bandits
Hurnscald Bandits
quest.text: The bandit lord is dead. I should claim my reward with Helena.

quest.name: Hurnscald Bandits
Hurnscald Bandits
quest.text: I'm now friends with Helena.
Every day, I can bring her some Treasure Keys or Bandit Hoods.
The keys will also help with Melina's beer supply - great!

quest.name: A Tea For Two
A Tea For Two
quest.text: The Doctor asked me for various herbs, and a haste potion.

quest.name: A Tea For Two
A Tea For Two
quest.text: The Doctor had his herbal tea, and he can make more for me.

quest.name: An Early Christmas
An Early Christmas
quest.text: Bring an Herbal Tea to Miler, a friend from The Doctor.

quest.name: True Buccaneer
True Buccaneer
quest.text: Arr, I was told that George needs help! Gotta help pirates, 'cause I'm so cool! Arr!

quest.name: True Buccaneer
True Buccaneer
quest.text: Arr, I should return with 30 Beer, 30 Casino Coins and 50 Empty Bottles! Arr Yarr!

quest.name: True Buccaneer
True Buccaneer
quest.text: Yarr, I got a nice hat for helping! Arr, he might need help later!
